```{r echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, results="hide"}
library(teal.modules.general)
library(random.cdisc.data)
library(dplyr)
ADSL <- cadsl
ADSL_2 <- cadsl
ADRS <- cadrs
ADTTE <- cadtte
ADLB <- cadlb %>%
  mutate(CHGC = as.factor(case_when(
    CHG < 1 ~ "N",
    CHG > 1 ~ "P",
    TRUE ~ "-"
  )))

app <- init(
  data = cdisc_data(
    cdisc_dataset("ADSL", ADSL),
    dataset("ADSL_2", ADSL_2, keys = get_cdisc_keys("ADSL")),
    cdisc_dataset("ADRS", ADRS),
    cdisc_dataset("ADTTE", ADTTE),
    cdisc_dataset("ADLB", ADLB),
    code = "ADSL <- cadsl
            ADSL_2 <- cadsl
            ADRS <- cadrs
            ADTTE <- cadtte
            ADLB <- cadlb %>%
            mutate(CHGC = as.factor(case_when(
            CHG < 1 ~ 'N',
            CHG > 1 ~ 'P',
            TRUE ~ '-'
            )))",
    check = TRUE
  ),
  modules = root_modules(
    modules(
      label = "Cross table",
      tm_cross_table(
        label = "Single wide dataset",
        x = data_extract_spec(
          "ADSL",
          select = select_spec(
            label = "Select variable:",
            choices = names(ADSL),
            selected = names(ADSL)[5],
            multiple = FALSE,
            fixed = FALSE
          )
        ),
        y = data_extract_spec(
          "ADSL",
          select = select_spec(
            label = "Select variable:",
            choices = names(ADSL),
            selected = names(ADSL)[6],
            multiple = FALSE,
            fixed = FALSE
          )
        )
      ),

      tm_cross_table(
        label = "Same long datasets (different subsets)",
        x = data_extract_spec(
          dataname = "ADLB",
          filter = filter_spec(
            vars = "PARAMCD",
            choices = levels(ADLB$PARAMCD),
            selected = levels(ADLB$PARAMCD)[1],
            multiple = FALSE
          ),
          select = select_spec(
            choices = names(ADLB),
            selected = "AVISIT",
            multiple = FALSE,
            fixed = FALSE,
            label = "Select variable:"
          )
        ),
        y = data_extract_spec(
          dataname = "ADLB",
          filter = filter_spec(
            vars = "PARAMCD",
            choices = levels(ADLB$PARAMCD),
            selected = levels(ADLB$PARAMCD)[1],
            multiple = FALSE
          ),
          select = select_spec(
            choices = names(ADLB),
            selected = "LOQFL",
            multiple = FALSE,
            fixed = FALSE,
            label = "Select variable:"
          )
        )
      )
    )
  )
)
      
```


```{r echo=FALSE}
shinyApp(app$ui, app$server, options = list(height = 1024, width = 1024))
```
